<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vishkanya Infiltrator](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1361)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

From a distance, vishkanyas share more than a passing resemblance to humans. However, a closer inspection reveals ophidian eyes with gold or white coloring, a forked tongue, and tiny, smooth scales set in serpentine patterns atop their skin. Even so, most onlookers assume these features to be an indicator of [tiefling](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=26) heritage or draconic magic, never suspecting how truly unusual the subject of their speculation is. Among outsiders, little is known of the vishkanya ancestry other than that a vishkanya carries a potent venom within their blood and saliva, knowledge which has led to widespread fear and distrust. To avoid persecution, vishkanyas entrench themselves deep into their chosen societies and train in the arts of subtlety. Drawn to work that allows them to put their skills to good use, vishkanyas often take the roles of spy, mercenary, bodyguard, and even assassin.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Vishkanya Infiltrator](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1361)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 288</row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Vishkanyan](/Languages.aspx?ID=73)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +9, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79) (10), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +6 (+8 vs. [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126))

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shuriken +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Envenom** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Using either saliva or blood, the vishkanya applies vishkanyan venom to one weapon they're holding. To use their blood, they must be injured, or they can deal themselves 1 slashing damage as part of the action.

**Flexible**   The vishkanya infiltrator is adept at dealing with tight situations. They have a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).

**Proficient Poisoner**   The vishkanya infiltrator doesn't lose the poison on a weapon due to a critically failed Strike.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The vishkanya deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Vishkanyan Venom**  ([Injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d4 poison damage, flat-footed, and a –5-foot penalty to Speed (1 round)

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Toxicity</title>

Although the idea that vishkanyas are able to administer their venom at a mere touch is a myth, some powerful vishkanyas can concentrate their innate toxins, resulting in more potent venom, or venoms that have different effects.
</aside>
